title: Keyboard stops working after Nexus turrets go down
body:
I keep having this consistent problem where my keyboard (SteelSeries Apex) stops working as soon as my team takes down both nexus turrets. I can still use my mouse for everything but in game keyboard "commands" don't work (e.g. spell casts, item casts, pings etc...). 

Can anyone help solve this issue as it is really annoying when we destroy the turrets and try to run and I can't stop the enemies (support main) cause I cannot cast any spells unless I use the mouse to cast all my spells.
